title: jungle
body: season 4 jungle was perfect. any champ could jungle because of the spirit stone items. sure junglers hyper carried games, but that was fun!!! :D i mean, compared to s5 jungle, s4 looks like heaven. lets bring s4 jugnle back..if anything just keep the xp as low and gold income same..but bring back spirit items and well call it even rito

replies.body: But this would allow for a variety of team comps instead of forcing people into a strict meta. Why??

I recall there was some justification somewhere
Idk if anyone bothered to read it tho

jungle diversity is a broad term
it does NOT necessarily have to mean CHAMPION diversity 

there were issues with the old jungle... they werent issues that the players would mind of course
the jungle could potentially be very uninteractive... easy... free farm... etc.
cmon, you sorta just camped in there all day and gank when and where you please cuz regardless of the outcome, unless death
the repercussions to the jungler for making the decision are nonexistent
speaking of decisions, very little went into it outside out objective control and when you felt like ganking
of course
the players would probably think... thats fantastic!

Id say subtract 5 ad from every jungle monster (excluding baron and dragon) and see where that leaves us.
